text: MATLAB is responsible for many more great programmers than the quality of its language would suggest.

elements.text: MATLAB is responsible for many more great programmers than the quality of its language would suggest.

text:
the secret is:
1. it doesn’t poison their minds with OOP
2. people using it just want to get things done and tend not to overthink it (see point 1)

elements.text:
the secret is:
1. it doesn’t poison their minds with OOP
2. people using it just want to get things done and tend not to overthink it (see point 1)

text: this makes Matlab sound like Cunningham’s Law reincarnated as a programming language
